parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value of this parameter must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of databases to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance is created.
